properties.Name: ItemManufacturer
properties.Description:
The manufacturer of a particular item. 

Note that a company may choose to use products from more than one manufacturer to include as a single ITEM or SKU. For example a company may have a single SKU for bolts that are manufactured by three different companies each of which have their own unique UPC etc. for the product that they produce.

Columns.Name: ManufacturerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Manufacturer.

Columns.Name: ItemSku
Columns.Description: The Stock Keeping Unit identifier, which is typically used for inventory-related activities.

Columns.Name: ManufacturerItemSku
Columns.Description: The Stock Keeping Unit identifier specified by the Manufacturer.

Columns.Name: ItemManufacturerNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Item Manufacturer.
